thread.title: Deadpool's score is being written by Mad Max: Fury Road's Junkie XL - Movies
thread.title_full: Deadpool's score is being written by Mad Max: Fury Road's Junkie XL - Movies News - Digital Spy

author: Ian Sandwell
title: Deadpool's score is being written by Mad Max: Fury Road's Junkie XL - Movies
text: He's been on the road with Mad Max, and now Junkie XL has announced he'll be scoring Deadpool.The composer took to Twitter to reveal that he was due to begin work on the hotly anticipated R-rated Marvel adaptation today (October 5).On Monday I will start on @deadpoolmovie !!!! So excited!!! pic.twitter.com/BvztrZxiFG— Tom Holkenborg (@Junkie_XL) October 4, 2015Junkie XL - real name Tom Holkenborg - has had previous experience with comic book films, having worked on The Dark Knight Rises, Man of Steel and The Amazing Spider-Man 2.Last November, it was announced that he was going to collaborate with Hans Zimmer on Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice. © 20th Century Fox This year has seen Junkie XL score Mad Max: Fury Road and Run All Night, as well as the upcoming Kill Your Friends.Starring Ryan Reynolds, Morena Baccarin, Ed Skrein, TJ Miller and Gina Carano, Deadpool will arrive in all its bloody, sweary, fourth wall-breaking glory on February 12, 2016.Watch a trailer for the film below: function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID); modVP = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.VIDEO_PLAYER); modExp = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.EXPERIENCE); modCon = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.CONTENT); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.BEGIN, onVideoStart); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.STOP, onVideoStop); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.PROGRESS, onVideoProgress); } #_containermyExperience4400491110001 { height: 100%; } // InSkin integration parameters: InSkinParams['myInSkin14400491110001'] = { 'srv_SectionID': '', 'srv_SectionIDPlay': '123757', 'srv_Keywords': '', 'plr_ContentID': 'myExperience4400491110001', 'plr_ContentType': 'BRIGHTCOVE3', 'plr_ContentW': 558, 'plr_ContentH': 314, 'plr_NoSkinContentResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinContentW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinContentH': 348, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinH': 348, 'plr_ResizeOnHideSkin': true, 'plr_HideSkinOnExternalAd': 'all', 'plr_ShowSkinAfterExternalAd': true, 'cnt_SmartPlayer': true }; // create the InSkin object: var InSkinObject4400491110001 = new InSkin.Base('myInSkin14400491110001'); brightcove.createExperiences(); if (!navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i)) { InSkinObject4400491110001.init(); ai_type="video"; }
